item.title: Conclusion of Annual Grand Vajrakilaya Puja at Guru Sakya Monastery, Darjeeling (Part II)
item.description: 4 On the 29th of August, the last of the five monks who undertook his ritual exams finished his exams.

item.title: Annual Grand Vajrakilaya Puja at Ghoom Guru Sakya Monastery in Darjeeling, India (Part I)
item.description: 1 On August 22nd 2018 His Eminence Khondhung Asanga Vajra Rinpoche and entourage arrived at the Ghoom Guru Sakya Monastery in Darjeeling, India.
